mapper.insert: insert into tbl_project (prj_no, prj_title, start_d8, end_d8, prj_writer, prj_mod_writer, prj_write_d8, prj_mod_d8, prj_content, prj_remark, cond, rmv_yn) values ( tbl_project_seq.nextval, #{prj_title}, #{start_d8}, #{end_d8}, #{prj_writer}, #{prj_mod_writer}, sysdate, sysdate, #{prj_content}, #{prj_remark}, #{cond}, 'N') SELECT tbl_project_seq.currval FROM dual
mapper.select: SELECT tp.*, tpi.authority, tpi.prj_in_no, tr.RPT_NO FROM TBL_PROJECT tp JOIN TBL_PROJECT_IN tpi ON tp.PRJ_NO = tpi.PRJ_NO LEFT JOIN tbl_report tr ON tr.RPT_WRITER = tpi.PRJ_IN_NO AND TO_CHAR(tr.RPT_WRITE_D8, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') where cond IN ('예정', '진행중') AND tp.rmv_YN in ('N') AND tpi.email = #{email}
select * from tbl_project where cond IN ('예정', '진행중')
SELECT tp.*, tpi.authority FROM TBL_PROJECT tp JOIN TBL_PROJECT_IN tpi ON tp.PRJ_NO = tpi.PRJ_NO WHERE cond IN ('완료') AND rmv_YN in ('N') AND tpi.EMAIL in (#{email})
select * from tbl_project where cond IN ('완료')
mapper.update: update tbl_project set rmv_YN = 'Y' where prj_no = #{prj_no}

update tbl_project set prj_title = #{prj_title}, start_d8 = #{start_d8}, end_d8 = #{end_d8}, prj_mod_writer = #{prj_mod_writer}, prj_mod_d8 = sysdate, prj_content = #{prj_content}, prj_remark = #{prj_remark}, cond = #{cond} where prj_no = #{prj_no}
